nodes.text: If I was a chestmaker, I'd say, "This grand old chest is marked with dents, scratches, and imperfections that only add to its unique appearance and value."
If I was anyone else, I'd say, "Man, this thing is in crummy shape."
... maybe there are barnacles holding it in place. It seems permanently fixed to the floor.
At least I got something out of taking the Rogue class - lockpick skills!
I hope that there are no more Gogs waddling around to catch me at this. The Gogs will probably disapprove of my actions.
Rats. I need to practice my lockpicking skill more.
I really need some lockpicks to open this.
Somebody left quite a selection of goodies in here for me!
Okay, this looks like some sort of fancy tiara... with a panda design on it.
Why, it must be a Pandiara!
Hey, this isn't wine... It's a Flambe.
Nice, there's a pile of coins at the bottom of the chest.
More dried fish for my collection. Lovely.
Somebody's stolen everything in this chest.
